activity_description: A beginner yoga class for those looking to improve flexibility and balance right at the local park.
Learn to make delicious and healthy meals while mastering the knife safely and with ease. Learn with me as I practice the skills I learn through my online class.

activity_name: Sip & Paint at the New Parkway
activity_description: Explore your creativity and practice painting techniques with a local artists who paint along side each other. Great opportunity to meet local artist and art novices.
Join a group of outdoor enthusiasts for a scenic hike in the mountains.
Tackle that 5000 piece world map puzzle.
Come along and get some locally grown fresh vegetables. It's also a great time to meet local artisan
Bring a blanket and some snacks and enjoy a movie under the stars in the local park. A great opportunity to meet neighbords and make new friends.

Join us for a refreshing morning dog walk with your furry friends! This activity is perfect for dog owners who want to socialize their dogs and meet other dog owners in the community. We'll be walking through the neighborhood park trails and exploring the neighborhood, all while enjoying the fresh air and exercise.
Daily walks by the Chattahoochee river or local trail

Riding bikes is a fun and exciting way to explore the outdoors while also getting a great workout. Join in for a leisurely ride through scenic routes, stopping along the way to take in the sights and snap some photos. .
